Title: Bigger Fish to Fry
Description:
I've prepared a team of bright young Pearlfin trainees who need field experience.

Take them northeast, into the Bamboo Wilds, and kill any wildlife that you find.

Don't bring them back until they're fit for battle.
ObjectivesText: Train the Pearlfin Adepts by killing 24 wildlife in the Bamboo Wilds.
RewardText:
Your trainees returned recently. I could hardly believe my eyes! They did not look like the same jinyu that you left with.

Excellent work, $c. Couldn't have done better myself.
